All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, MDIClientFrame, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PythonFrame
extends javax.swing.JInternalFrame
implements MDIClientFrame

An MDI client frame that holds a PythonPanel.
